docs.text_entry: To line his enterprise: but if you go,--

docs.speaker: HOTSPUR
docs.text_entry: So far afoot, I shall be weary, love.

docs.speaker: LADY PERCY
docs.text_entry: Come, come, you paraquito, answer me

docs.speaker: LADY PERCY
docs.text_entry: Directly unto this question that I ask:

docs.speaker: LADY PERCY
docs.text_entry: In faith, Ill break thy little finger, Harry,

docs.speaker: LADY PERCY
docs.text_entry: An if thou wilt not tell me all things true.

docs.speaker: HOTSPUR
docs.text_entry: Away,

docs.speaker: HOTSPUR
docs.text_entry: Away, you trifler! Love! I love thee not,

docs.speaker: HOTSPUR
docs.text_entry: I care not for thee, Kate: this is no world

docs.speaker: HOTSPUR
docs.text_entry: To play with mammets and to tilt with lips:

docs.speaker: HOTSPUR
docs.text_entry: We must have bloody noses and crackd crowns,

docs.speaker: HOTSPUR
docs.text_entry: And pass them current too. Gods me, my horse!

docs.speaker: HOTSPUR
docs.text_entry: What sayst thou, Kate? what wouldst thou

docs.speaker: HOTSPUR
docs.text_entry: have with me?

docs.speaker: LADY PERCY
docs.text_entry: Do you not love me? do you not, indeed?

docs.speaker: LADY PERCY
docs.text_entry: Well, do not then; for since you love me not,

docs.speaker: LADY PERCY
docs.text_entry: I will not love myself. Do you not love me?

docs.speaker: LADY PERCY
docs.text_entry: Nay, tell me if you speak in jest or no.

docs.speaker: HOTSPUR
docs.text_entry: Come, wilt thou see me ride?

docs.speaker: HOTSPUR
docs.text_entry: And when I am on horseback, I will swear

docs.speaker: HOTSPUR
docs.text_entry: I love thee infinitely. But hark you, Kate;

docs.speaker: HOTSPUR
docs.text_entry: I must not have you henceforth question me

docs.speaker: HOTSPUR
docs.text_entry: Whither I go, nor reason whereabout:

docs.speaker: HOTSPUR
docs.text_entry: Whither I must, I must; and, to conclude,

docs.speaker: HOTSPUR
docs.text_entry: This evening must I leave you, gentle Kate.

docs.speaker: HOTSPUR
docs.text_entry: I know you wise, but yet no farther wise

docs.speaker: HOTSPUR
docs.text_entry: Than Harry Percys wife: constant you are,

docs.speaker: HOTSPUR
docs.text_entry: But yet a woman: and for secrecy,

docs.speaker: HOTSPUR
docs.text_entry: No lady closer; for I well believe

docs.speaker: HOTSPUR
docs.text_entry: Thou wilt not utter what thou dost not know;

docs.speaker: HOTSPUR
docs.text_entry: And so far will I trust thee, gentle Kate.

docs.speaker: LADY PERCY
docs.text_entry: How! so far?

docs.speaker: HOTSPUR
docs.text_entry: Not an inch further. But hark you, Kate:

docs.speaker: HOTSPUR
docs.text_entry: Whither I go, thither shall you go too;

docs.speaker: HOTSPUR
docs.text_entry: To-day will I set forth, to-morrow you.

docs.speaker: HOTSPUR
docs.text_entry: Will this content you, Kate?

docs.speaker: LADY PERCY
docs.text_entry: It must of force.

docs.speaker: LADY PERCY
docs.text_entry: Exeunt

docs.speaker: LADY PERCY
docs.text_entry: SCENE IV. The Boars-Head Tavern, Eastcheap.

docs.speaker: LADY PERCY
docs.text_entry: Enter PRINCE HENRY and POINS

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Ned, prithee, come out of that fat room, and lend me

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: thy hand to laugh a little.

docs.speaker: POINS
docs.text_entry: Where hast been, Hal?

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: With three or four loggerheads amongst three or four

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: score hogsheads. I have sounded the very

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: base-string of humility. Sirrah, I am sworn brother

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: to a leash of drawers; and can call them all by

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: their christen names, as Tom, Dick, and Francis.

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: They take it already upon their salvation, that

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: though I be but the prince of Wales, yet I am king

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: of courtesy; and tell me flatly I am no proud Jack,

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: like Falstaff, but a Corinthian, a lad of mettle, a

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: good boy, by the Lord, so they call me, and when I

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: am king of England, I shall command all the good

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: lads in Eastcheap. They call drinking deep, dyeing

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: scarlet; and when you breathe in your watering, they

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: cry  hem! and bid you play it off. To conclude, I

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: am so good a proficient in one quarter of an hour,

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: that I can drink with any tinker in his own language

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: during my life. I tell thee, Ned, thou hast lost

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: much honour, that thou wert not with me in this sweet

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: action. But, sweet Ned,--to sweeten which name of

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Ned, I give thee this pennyworth of sugar, clapped

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: even now into my hand by an under-skinker, one that

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: never spake other English in his life than Eight

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: shillings and sixpence and You are welcome, with

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: this shrill addition, Anon, anon, sir! Score a pint

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: of bastard in the Half-Moon, or so. But, Ned, to

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: drive away the time till Falstaff come, I prithee,

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: do thou stand in some by-room, while I question my

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: puny drawer to what end he gave me the sugar; and do

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: thou never leave calling Francis, that his tale

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: to me may be nothing but Anon. Step aside, and

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Ill show thee a precedent.

docs.speaker: POINS
docs.text_entry: Francis!

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Thou art perfect.

docs.speaker: POINS
docs.text_entry: Francis!

docs.speaker: POINS
docs.text_entry: Exit POINS

docs.speaker: POINS
docs.text_entry: Enter FRANCIS

docs.speaker: FRANCIS
docs.text_entry: Anon, anon, sir. Look down into the Pomgarnet, Ralph.

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Come hither, Francis.

docs.speaker: FRANCIS
docs.text_entry: My lord?

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: How long hast thou to serve, Francis?

docs.speaker: FRANCIS
docs.text_entry: Forsooth, five years, and as much as to--

docs.speaker: POINS
docs.text_entry: [Within]  Francis!

docs.speaker: FRANCIS
docs.text_entry: Anon, anon, sir.

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Five year! byr lady, a long lease for the clinking

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: of pewter. But, Francis, darest thou be so valiant

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: as to play the coward with thy indenture and show it

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: a fair pair of heels and run from it?

docs.speaker: FRANCIS
docs.text_entry: O Lord, sir, Ill be sworn upon all the books in

docs.speaker: FRANCIS
docs.text_entry: England, I could find in my heart.

docs.speaker: POINS
docs.text_entry: [Within]  Francis!

docs.speaker: FRANCIS
docs.text_entry: Anon, sir.

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: How old art thou, Francis?

docs.speaker: FRANCIS
docs.text_entry: Let me see--about Michaelmas next I shall be--

docs.speaker: POINS
docs.text_entry: [Within]  Francis!

docs.speaker: FRANCIS
docs.text_entry: Anon, sir. Pray stay a little, my lord.

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Nay, but hark you, Francis: for the sugar thou

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: gavest me,twas a pennyworth, wastt not?

docs.speaker: FRANCIS
docs.text_entry: O Lord, I would it had been two!

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: I will give thee for it a thousand pound: ask me

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: when thou wilt, and thou shalt have it.

docs.speaker: POINS
docs.text_entry: [Within]  Francis!

docs.speaker: FRANCIS
docs.text_entry: Anon, anon.

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Anon, Francis? No, Francis; but to-morrow, Francis;

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: or, Francis, o Thursday; or indeed, Francis, when

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: thou wilt. But, Francis!

docs.speaker: FRANCIS
docs.text_entry: My lord?

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Wilt thou rob this leathern jerkin, crystal-button,

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: not-pated, agate-ring, puke-stocking, caddis-garter,

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: smooth-tongue, Spanish-pouch,--

docs.speaker: FRANCIS
docs.text_entry: O Lord, sir, who do you mean?

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Why, then, your brown bastard is your only drink;

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: for look you, Francis, your white canvas doublet

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: will sully: in Barbary, sir, it cannot come to so much.

docs.speaker: FRANCIS
docs.text_entry: What, sir?

docs.speaker: POINS
docs.text_entry: [Within]  Francis!

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Away, you rogue! dost thou not hear them call?

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Here they both call him; the drawer stands amazed, not knowing which way to go

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Enter Vintner

docs.speaker: Vintner
docs.text_entry: What, standest thou still, and hearest such a

docs.speaker: Vintner
docs.text_entry: calling? Look to the guests within.

docs.speaker: Vintner
docs.text_entry: Exit Francis

docs.speaker: Vintner
docs.text_entry: My lord, old Sir John, with half-a-dozen more, are

docs.speaker: Vintner
docs.text_entry: at the door: shall I let them in?

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Let them alone awhile, and then open the door.

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Exit Vintner

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Poins!

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Re-enter POINS

docs.speaker: POINS
docs.text_entry: Anon, anon, sir.

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Sirrah, Falstaff and the rest of the thieves are at

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: the door: shall we be merry?

docs.speaker: POINS
docs.text_entry: As merry as crickets, my lad. But hark ye; what

docs.speaker: POINS
docs.text_entry: cunning match have you made with this jest of the

docs.speaker: POINS
docs.text_entry: drawer? come, whats the issue?

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: I am now of all humours that have showed themselves

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: humours since the old days of goodman Adam to the

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: pupil age of this present twelve oclock at midnight.

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Re-enter FRANCIS

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Whats oclock, Francis?

docs.speaker: FRANCIS
docs.text_entry: Anon, anon, sir.

docs.speaker: FRANCIS
docs.text_entry: Exit

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: That ever this fellow should have fewer words than a

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: parrot, and yet the son of a woman! His industry is

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: upstairs and downstairs; his eloquence the parcel of

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: a reckoning. I am not yet of Percys mind, the

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Hotspur of the north; he that kills me some six or

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: seven dozen of Scots at a breakfast, washes his

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: hands, and says to his wife Fie upon this quiet

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: life! I want work. O my sweet Harry, says she,

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: how many hast thou killed to-day? Give my roan

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: horse a drench, says he; and answers Some

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: fourteen, an hour after; a trifle, a trifle. I

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: prithee, call in Falstaff: Ill play Percy, and

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: that damned brawn shall play Dame Mortimer his

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: wife. Rivo! says the drunkard. Call in ribs, call in tallow.

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Enter FALSTAFF, GADSHILL, BARDOLPH, and PETO; FRANCIS following with wine

docs.speaker: POINS
docs.text_entry: Welcome, Jack: where hast thou been?

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: A plague of all cowards, I say, and a vengeance too!

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: marry, and amen! Give me a cup of sack, boy. Ere I

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: lead this life long, Ill sew nether stocks and mend

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: them and foot them too. A plague of all cowards!

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: Give me a cup of sack, rogue. Is there no virtue extant?

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: He drinks

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Didst thou never see Titan kiss a dish of butter?

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: pitiful-hearted Titan, that melted at the sweet tale

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: of the suns! if thou didst, then behold that compound.

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: You rogue, heres lime in this sack too: there is

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: nothing but roguery to be found in villanous man:

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: yet a coward is worse than a cup of sack with lime

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: in it. A villanous coward! Go thy ways, old Jack;

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: die when thou wilt, if manhood, good manhood, be

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: not forgot upon the face of the earth, then am I a

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: shotten herring. There live not three good men

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: unhanged in England; and one of them is fat and

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: grows old: God help the while! a bad world, I say.

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: I would I were a weaver; I could sing psalms or any

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: thing. A plague of all cowards, I say still.

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: How now, wool-sack! what mutter you?

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: A kings son! If I do not beat thee out of thy

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: kingdom with a dagger of lath, and drive all thy

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: subjects afore thee like a flock of wild-geese,

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: Ill never wear hair on my face more. You Prince of Wales!

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Why, you whoreson round man, whats the matter?

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: Are not you a coward? answer me to that: and Poins there?

docs.speaker: POINS
docs.text_entry: Zounds, ye fat paunch, an ye call me coward, by the

docs.speaker: POINS
docs.text_entry: Lord, Ill stab thee.

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: I call thee coward! Ill see thee damned ere I call

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: thee coward: but I would give a thousand pound I

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: could run as fast as thou canst. You are straight

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: enough in the shoulders, you care not who sees your

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: back: call you that backing of your friends? A

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: plague upon such backing! give me them that will

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: face me. Give me a cup of sack: I am a rogue, if I

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: drunk to-day.

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: O villain! thy lips are scarce wiped since thou

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: drunkest last.

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: Alls one for that.

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: He drinks

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: A plague of all cowards, still say I.

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Whats the matter?

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: Whats the matter! there be four of us here have

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: taen a thousand pound this day morning.

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Where is it, Jack? where is it?

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: Where is it! taken from us it is: a hundred upon

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: poor four of us.

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: What, a hundred, man?

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: I am a rogue, if I were not at half-sword with a

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: dozen of them two hours together. I have scaped by

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: miracle. I am eight times thrust through the

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: doublet, four through the hose; my buckler cut

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: through and through; my sword hacked like a

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: hand-saw--ecce signum! I never dealt better since

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: I was a man: all would not do. A plague of all

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: cowards! Let them speak: if they speak more or

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: less than truth, they are villains and the sons of darkness.

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Speak, sirs; how was it?

docs.speaker: GADSHILL
docs.text_entry: We four set upon some dozen--

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: Sixteen at least, my lord.

docs.speaker: GADSHILL
docs.text_entry: And bound them.

docs.speaker: PETO
docs.text_entry: No, no, they were not bound.

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: You rogue, they were bound, every man of them; or I

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: am a Jew else, an Ebrew Jew.

docs.speaker: GADSHILL
docs.text_entry: As we were sharing, some six or seven fresh men set upon us--

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: And unbound the rest, and then come in the other.

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: What, fought you with them all?

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: All! I know not what you call all; but if I fought

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: not with fifty of them, I am a bunch of radish: if

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: there were not two or three and fifty upon poor old

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: Jack, then am I no two-legged creature.

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Pray God you have not murdered some of them.

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: Nay, thats past praying for: I have peppered two

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: of them; two I am sure I have paid, two rogues

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: in buckram suits. I tell thee what, Hal, if I tell

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: thee a lie, spit in my face, call me horse. Thou

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: knowest my old ward; here I lay and thus I bore my

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: point. Four rogues in buckram let drive at me--

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: What, four? thou saidst but two even now.

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: Four, Hal; I told thee four.

docs.speaker: POINS
docs.text_entry: Ay, ay, he said four.

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: These four came all a-front, and mainly thrust at

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: me. I made me no more ado but took all their seven

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: points in my target, thus.

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Seven? why, there were but four even now.

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: In buckram?

docs.speaker: POINS
docs.text_entry: Ay, four, in buckram suits.

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: Seven, by these hilts, or I am a villain else.

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Prithee, let him alone; we shall have more anon.

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: Dost thou hear me, Hal?

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Ay, and mark thee too, Jack.

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: Do so, for it is worth the listening to. These nine

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: in buckram that I told thee of--

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: So, two more already.

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: Their points being broken,--

docs.speaker: POINS
docs.text_entry: Down fell their hose.

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: Began to give me ground: but I followed me close,

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: came in foot and hand; and with a thought seven of

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: the eleven I paid.

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: O monstrous! eleven buckram men grown out of two!

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: But, as the devil would have it, three misbegotten

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: knaves in Kendal green came at my back and let drive

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: at me; for it was so dark, Hal, that thou couldst

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: not see thy hand.

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: These lies are like their father that begets them;

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: gross as a mountain, open, palpable. Why, thou

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: clay-brained guts, thou knotty-pated fool, thou

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: whoreson, obscene, grease tallow-catch,--

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: What, art thou mad? art thou mad? is not the truth

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: the truth?

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Why, how couldst thou know these men in Kendal

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: green, when it was so dark thou couldst not see thy

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: hand? come, tell us your reason: what sayest thou to this?

docs.speaker: POINS
docs.text_entry: Come, your reason, Jack, your reason.

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: What, upon compulsion? Zounds, an I were at the

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: strappado, or all the racks in the world, I would

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: not tell you on compulsion. Give you a reason on

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: compulsion! If reasons were as plentiful as

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: blackberries, I would give no man a reason upon

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: compulsion, I.

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Ill be no longer guilty of this sin; this sanguine

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: coward, this bed-presser, this horseback-breaker,

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: this huge hill of flesh,--

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: Sblood, you starveling, you elf-skin, you dried

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: neats tongue, you bulls pizzle, you stock-fish! O

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: for breath to utter what is like thee! you

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: tailors-yard, you sheath, you bowcase; you vile

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: standing-tuck,--

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Well, breathe awhile, and then to it again: and

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: when thou hast tired thyself in base comparisons,

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: hear me speak but this.

docs.speaker: POINS
docs.text_entry: Mark, Jack.

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: We two saw you four set on four and bound them, and

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: were masters of their wealth. Mark now, how a plain

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: tale shall put you down. Then did we two set on you

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: four; and, with a word, out-faced you from your

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: prize, and have it; yea, and can show it you here in

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: the house: and, Falstaff, you carried your guts

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: away as nimbly, with as quick dexterity, and roared

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: for mercy and still run and roared, as ever I heard

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: bull-calf. What a slave art thou, to hack thy sword

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: as thou hast done, and then say it was in fight!

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: What trick, what device, what starting-hole, canst

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: thou now find out to hide thee from this open and

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: apparent shame?

docs.speaker: POINS
docs.text_entry: Come, lets hear, Jack; what trick hast thou now?

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: By the Lord, I knew ye as well as he that made ye.

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: Why, hear you, my masters: was it for me to kill the

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: heir-apparent? should I turn upon the true prince?

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: why, thou knowest I am as valiant as Hercules: but

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: beware instinct; the lion will not touch the true

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: prince. Instinct is a great matter; I was now a

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: coward on instinct. I shall think the better of

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: myself and thee during my life; I for a valiant

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: lion, and thou for a true prince. But, by the Lord,

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: lads, I am glad you have the money. Hostess, clap

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: to the doors: watch to-night, pray to-morrow.

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: Gallants, lads, boys, hearts of gold, all the titles

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: of good fellowship come to you! What, shall we be

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: merry? shall we have a play extempore?

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Content; and the argument shall be thy running away.

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: Ah, no more of that, Hal, an thou lovest me!

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: Enter Hostess

docs.speaker: Hostess
docs.text_entry: O Jesu, my lord the prince!

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: How now, my lady the hostess! what sayest thou to

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: me?

docs.speaker: Hostess
docs.text_entry: Marry, my lord, there is a nobleman of the court at

docs.speaker: Hostess
docs.text_entry: door would speak with you: he says he comes from

docs.speaker: Hostess
docs.text_entry: your father.

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Give him as much as will make him a royal man, and

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: send him back again to my mother.

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: What manner of man is he?

docs.speaker: Hostess
docs.text_entry: An old man.

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: What doth gravity out of his bed at midnight? Shall

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: I give him his answer?

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Prithee, do, Jack.

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: Faith, and Ill send him packing.

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: Exit FALSTAFF

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Now, sirs: byr lady, you fought fair; so did you,

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Peto; so did you, Bardolph: you are lions too, you

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: ran away upon instinct, you will not touch the true

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: prince; no, fie!

docs.speaker: BARDOLPH
docs.text_entry: Faith, I ran when I saw others run.

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Faith, tell me now in earnest, how came Falstaffs

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: sword so hacked?

docs.speaker: PETO
docs.text_entry: Why, he hacked it with his dagger, and said he would

docs.speaker: PETO
docs.text_entry: swear truth out of England but he would make you

docs.speaker: PETO
docs.text_entry: believe it was done in fight, and persuaded us to do the like.

docs.speaker: BARDOLPH
docs.text_entry: Yea, and to tickle our noses with spear-grass to

docs.speaker: BARDOLPH
docs.text_entry: make them bleed, and then to beslubber our garments

docs.speaker: BARDOLPH
docs.text_entry: with it and swear it was the blood of true men. I

docs.speaker: BARDOLPH
docs.text_entry: did that I did not this seven year before, I blushed

docs.speaker: BARDOLPH
docs.text_entry: to hear his monstrous devices.

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: O villain, thou stolest a cup of sack eighteen years

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: ago, and wert taken with the manner, and ever since

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: thou hast blushed extempore. Thou hadst fire and

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: sword on thy side, and yet thou rannest away: what

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: instinct hadst thou for it?

docs.speaker: BARDOLPH
docs.text_entry: My lord, do you see these meteors? do you behold

docs.speaker: BARDOLPH
docs.text_entry: these exhalations?

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: I do.

docs.speaker: BARDOLPH
docs.text_entry: What think you they portend?

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Hot livers and cold purses.

docs.speaker: BARDOLPH
docs.text_entry: Choler, my lord, if rightly taken.

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: No, if rightly taken, halter.

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Re-enter FALSTAFF

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Here comes lean Jack, here comes bare-bone.

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: How now, my sweet creature of bombast!

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: How long ist ago, Jack, since thou sawest thine own knee?

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: My own knee! when I was about thy years, Hal, I was

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: not an eagles talon in the waist; I could have

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: crept into any aldermans thumb-ring: a plague of

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: sighing and grief! it blows a man up like a

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: bladder. Theres villanous news abroad: here was

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: Sir John Bracy from your father; you must to the

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: court in the morning. That same mad fellow of the

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: north, Percy, and he of Wales, that gave Amamon the

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: bastinado and made Lucifer cuckold and swore the

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: devil his true liegeman upon the cross of a Welsh

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: hook--what a plague call you him?

docs.speaker: POINS
docs.text_entry: O, Glendower.

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: Owen, Owen, the same; and his son-in-law Mortimer,

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: and old Northumberland, and that sprightly Scot of

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: Scots, Douglas, that runs o horseback up a hill

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: perpendicular,--

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: He that rides at high speed and with his pistol

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: kills a sparrow flying.

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: You have hit it.

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: So did he never the sparrow.

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: Well, that rascal hath good mettle in him; he will not run.

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Why, what a rascal art thou then, to praise him so

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: for running!

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: O horseback, ye cuckoo; but afoot he will not budge a foot.

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Yes, Jack, upon instinct.

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: I grant ye, upon instinct. Well, he is there too,

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: and one Mordake, and a thousand blue-caps more:

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: Worcester is stolen away to-night; thy fathers

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: beard is turned white with the news: you may buy

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: land now as cheap as stinking mackerel.

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Why, then, it is like, if there come a hot June and

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: this civil buffeting hold, we shall buy maidenheads

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: as they buy hob-nails, by the hundreds.

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: By the mass, lad, thou sayest true; it is like we

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: shall have good trading that way. But tell me, Hal,

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: art not thou horrible afeard? thou being

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: heir-apparent, could the world pick thee out three

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: such enemies again as that fiend Douglas, that

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: spirit Percy, and that devil Glendower? Art thou

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: not horribly afraid? doth not thy blood thrill at

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: it?

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Not a whit, i faith; I lack some of thy instinct.

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: Well, thou wert be horribly chid tomorrow when thou

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: comest to thy father: if thou love me, practise an answer.

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Do thou stand for my father, and examine me upon the

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: particulars of my life.

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: Shall I? content: this chair shall be my state,

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: this dagger my sceptre, and this cushion my crown.

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Thy state is taken for a joined-stool, thy golden

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: sceptre for a leaden dagger, and thy precious rich

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: crown for a pitiful bald crown!

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: Well, an the fire of grace be not quite out of thee,

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: now shalt thou be moved. Give me a cup of sack to

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: make my eyes look red, that it may be thought I have

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: wept; for I must speak in passion, and I will do it

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: in King Cambyses vein.

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Well, here is my leg.

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: And here is my speech. Stand aside, nobility.

docs.speaker: Hostess
docs.text_entry: O Jesu, this is excellent sport, i faith!

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: Weep not, sweet queen; for trickling tears are vain.

docs.speaker: Hostess
docs.text_entry: O, the father, how he holds his countenance!

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: For Gods sake, lords, convey my tristful queen;

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: For tears do stop the flood-gates of her eyes.

docs.speaker: Hostess
docs.text_entry: O Jesu, he doth it as like one of these harlotry

docs.speaker: Hostess
docs.text_entry: players as ever I see!

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: Peace, good pint-pot; peace, good tickle-brain.

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: Harry, I do not only marvel where thou spendest thy

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: time, but also how thou art accompanied: for though

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: the camomile, the more it is trodden on the faster

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: it grows, yet youth, the more it is wasted the

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: sooner it wears. That thou art my son, I have

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: partly thy mothers word, partly my own opinion,

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: but chiefly a villanous trick of thine eye and a

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: foolish-hanging of thy nether lip, that doth warrant

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: me. If then thou be son to me, here lies the point;

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: why, being son to me, art thou so pointed at? Shall

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: the blessed sun of heaven prove a micher and eat

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: blackberries? a question not to be asked. Shall

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: the sun of England prove a thief and take purses? a

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: question to be asked. There is a thing, Harry,

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: which thou hast often heard of and it is known to

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: many in our land by the name of pitch: this pitch,

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: as ancient writers do report, doth defile; so doth

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: the company thou keepest: for, Harry, now I do not

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: speak to thee in drink but in tears, not in

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: pleasure but in passion, not in words only, but in

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: woes also: and yet there is a virtuous man whom I

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: have often noted in thy company, but I know not his name.

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: What manner of man, an it like your majesty?

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: A goodly portly man, i faith, and a corpulent; of a

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: cheerful look, a pleasing eye and a most noble

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: carriage; and, as I think, his age some fifty, or,

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: byr lady, inclining to three score; and now I

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: remember me, his name is Falstaff: if that man

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: should be lewdly given, he deceiveth me; for, Harry,

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: I see virtue in his looks. If then the tree may be

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: known by the fruit, as the fruit by the tree, then,

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: peremptorily I speak it, there is virtue in that

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: Falstaff: him keep with, the rest banish. And tell

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: me now, thou naughty varlet, tell me, where hast

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: thou been this month?

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Dost thou speak like a king? Do thou stand for me,

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: and Ill play my father.

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: Depose me? if thou dost it half so gravely, so

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: majestically, both in word and matter, hang me up by

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: the heels for a rabbit-sucker or a poulters hare.

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Well, here I am set.

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: And here I stand: judge, my masters.

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Now, Harry, whence come you?

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: My noble lord, from Eastcheap.

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: The complaints I hear of thee are grievous.

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: Sblood, my lord, they are false: nay, Ill tickle

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: ye for a young prince, i faith.

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Swearest thou, ungracious boy? henceforth neer look

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: on me. Thou art violently carried away from grace:

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: there is a devil haunts thee in the likeness of an

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: old fat man; a tun of man is thy companion. Why

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: dost thou converse with that trunk of humours, that

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: bolting-hutch of beastliness, that swollen parcel

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: of dropsies, that huge bombard of sack, that stuffed

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: cloak-bag of guts, that roasted Manningtree ox with

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: the pudding in his belly, that reverend vice, that

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: grey iniquity, that father ruffian, that vanity in

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: years? Wherein is he good, but to taste sack and

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: drink it? wherein neat and cleanly, but to carve a

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: capon and eat it? wherein cunning, but in craft?

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: wherein crafty, but in villany? wherein villanous,

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: but in all things? wherein worthy, but in nothing?

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: I would your grace would take me with you: whom

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: means your grace?

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: That villanous abominable misleader of youth,

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Falstaff, that old white-bearded Satan.

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: My lord, the man I know.

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: I know thou dost.

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: But to say I know more harm in him than in myself,

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: were to say more than I know. That he is old, the

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: more the pity, his white hairs do witness it; but

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: that he is, saving your reverence, a whoremaster,

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: that I utterly deny. If sack and sugar be a fault,

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: God help the wicked! if to be old and merry be a

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: sin, then many an old host that I know is damned: if

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: to be fat be to be hated, then Pharaohs lean kine

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: are to be loved. No, my good lord; banish Peto,

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: banish Bardolph, banish Poins: but for sweet Jack

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: Falstaff, kind Jack Falstaff, true Jack Falstaff,

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: valiant Jack Falstaff, and therefore more valiant,

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: being, as he is, old Jack Falstaff, banish not him

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: thy Harrys company, banish not him thy Harrys

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: company: banish plump Jack, and banish all the world.

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: I do, I will.

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: A knocking heard

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Exeunt Hostess, FRANCIS, and BARDOLPH

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Re-enter BARDOLPH, running

docs.speaker: BARDOLPH
docs.text_entry: O, my lord, my lord! the sheriff with a most

docs.speaker: BARDOLPH
docs.text_entry: monstrous watch is at the door.

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: Out, ye rogue! Play out the play: I have much to

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: say in the behalf of that Falstaff.

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: Re-enter the Hostess

docs.speaker: Hostess
docs.text_entry: O Jesu, my lord, my lord!

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Heigh, heigh! the devil rides upon a fiddlestick:

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: whats the matter?

docs.speaker: Hostess
docs.text_entry: The sheriff and all the watch are at the door: they

docs.speaker: Hostess
docs.text_entry: are come to search the house. Shall I let them in?

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: Dost thou hear, Hal? never call a true piece of

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: gold a counterfeit: thou art essentially mad,

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: without seeming so.

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: And thou a natural coward, without instinct.

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: I deny your major: if you will deny the sheriff,

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: so; if not, let him enter: if I become not a cart

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: as well as another man, a plague on my bringing up!

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: I hope I shall as soon be strangled with a halter as another.

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Go, hide thee behind the arras: the rest walk up

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: above. Now, my masters, for a true face and good

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: conscience.

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: Both which I have had: but their date is out, and

docs.speaker: FALSTAFF
docs.text_entry: therefore Ill hide me.

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Call in the sheriff.

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Exeunt all except PRINCE HENRY and PETO

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Enter Sheriff and the Carrier

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Now, master sheriff, what is your will with me?

docs.speaker: Sheriff
docs.text_entry: First, pardon me, my lord. A hue and cry

docs.speaker: Sheriff
docs.text_entry: Hath followd certain men unto this house.

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: What men?

docs.speaker: Sheriff
docs.text_entry: One of them is well known, my gracious lord,

docs.speaker: Sheriff
docs.text_entry: A gross fat man.

docs.speaker: Carrier
docs.text_entry: As fat as butter.

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: The man, I do assure you, is not here;

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: For I myself at this time have employd him.

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: And, sheriff, I will engage my word to thee

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: That I will, by to-morrow dinner-time,

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Send him to answer thee, or any man,

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: For any thing he shall be charged withal:

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: And so let me entreat you leave the house.

docs.speaker: Sheriff
docs.text_entry: I will, my lord. There are two gentlemen

docs.speaker: Sheriff
docs.text_entry: Have in this robbery lost three hundred marks.

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: It may be so: if he have robbd these men,

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: He shall be answerable; and so farewell.

docs.speaker: Sheriff
docs.text_entry: Good night, my noble lord.

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: I think it is good morrow, is it not?

docs.speaker: Sheriff
docs.text_entry: Indeed, my lord, I think it be two oclock.

docs.speaker: Sheriff
docs.text_entry: Exeunt Sheriff and Carrier

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: This oily rascal is known as well as Pauls. Go,

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: call him forth.

docs.speaker: PETO
docs.text_entry: Falstaff!--Fast asleep behind the arras, and

docs.speaker: PETO
docs.text_entry: snorting like a horse.

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Hark, how hard he fetches breath. Search his pockets.

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: He searcheth his pockets, and findeth certain papers

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: What hast thou found?

docs.speaker: PETO
docs.text_entry: Nothing but papers, my lord.

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Lets see what they be: read them.

docs.speaker: PETO
docs.text_entry: [Reads]  Item, A capon,. . 2s. 2d.

docs.speaker: PETO
docs.text_entry: Item, Sauce,. . . 4d.

docs.speaker: PETO
docs.text_entry: Item, Sack, two gallons, 5s. 8d.

docs.speaker: PETO
docs.text_entry: Item, Anchovies and sack after supper, 2s. 6d.

docs.speaker: PETO
docs.text_entry: Item, Bread,        ob.

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: O monstrous! but one half-penny-worth of bread to

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: this intolerable deal of sack! What there is else,

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: keep close; well read it at more advantage: there

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: let him sleep till day. Ill to the court in the

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: morning. We must all to the wars, and thy place

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: shall be honourable. Ill procure this fat rogue a

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: charge of foot; and I know his death will be a

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: march of twelve-score. The money shall be paid

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: back again with advantage. Be with me betimes in

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: the morning; and so, good morrow, Peto.

docs.speaker: PRINCE HENRY
docs.text_entry: Exeunt

docs.speaker: PETO
docs.text_entry: Good morrow, good my lord.

docs.speaker: PETO
docs.text_entry: ACT III

docs.speaker: PETO
docs.text_entry: SCENE I. Bangor. The Archdeacons house.

docs.speaker: PETO
docs.text_entry: Enter HOTSPUR, WORCESTER, MORTIMER, and GLENDOWER

docs.speaker: MORTIMER
docs.text_entry: These promises are fair, the parties sure,

docs.speaker: MORTIMER
docs.text_entry: And our induction full of prosperous hope.

docs.speaker: HOTSPUR
docs.text_entry: Lord Mortimer, and cousin Glendower,

docs.speaker: HOTSPUR
docs.text_entry: Will you sit down?

docs.speaker: HOTSPUR
docs.text_entry: And uncle Worcester: a plague upon it!

docs.speaker: HOTSPUR
docs.text_entry: I have forgot the map.

docs.speaker: GLENDOWER
docs.text_entry: No, here it is.

docs.speaker: GLENDOWER
docs.text_entry: Sit, cousin Percy; sit, good cousin Hotspur,

docs.speaker: GLENDOWER
docs.text_entry: For by that name as oft as Lancaster

docs.speaker: GLENDOWER
docs.text_entry: Doth speak of you, his cheek looks pale and with

docs.speaker: GLENDOWER
docs.text_entry: A rising sigh he wisheth you in heaven.

docs.speaker: HOTSPUR
docs.text_entry: And you in hell, as oft as he hears Owen Glendower spoke of.

docs.speaker: GLENDOWER
docs.text_entry: I cannot blame him: at my nativity

docs.speaker: GLENDOWER
docs.text_entry: The front of heaven was full of fiery shapes,

docs.speaker: GLENDOWER
docs.text_entry: Of burning cressets; and at my birth

docs.speaker: GLENDOWER
docs.text_entry: The frame and huge foundation of the earth

docs.speaker: GLENDOWER
docs.text_entry: Shaked like a coward.

docs.speaker: HOTSPUR
docs.text_entry: Why, so it would have done at the same season, if

docs.speaker: HOTSPUR
docs.text_entry: your mothers cat had but kittened, though yourself

docs.speaker: HOTSPUR
docs.text_entry: had never been born.

docs.speaker: GLENDOWER
docs.text_entry: I say the earth did shake when I was born.

docs.speaker: HOTSPUR
docs.text_entry: And I say the earth was not of my mind,

docs.speaker: HOTSPUR
docs.text_entry: If you suppose as fearing you it shook.

docs.speaker: GLENDOWER
docs.text_entry: The heavens were all on fire, the earth did tremble.

docs.speaker: HOTSPUR
docs.text_entry: O, then the earth shook to see the heavens on fire,

docs.speaker: HOTSPUR
docs.text_entry: And not in fear of your nativity.

docs.speaker: HOTSPUR
docs.text_entry: Diseased nature oftentimes breaks forth

docs.speaker: HOTSPUR
docs.text_entry: In strange eruptions; oft the teeming earth

docs.speaker: HOTSPUR
docs.text_entry: Is with a kind of colic pinchd and vexd

docs.speaker: HOTSPUR
docs.text_entry: By the imprisoning of unruly wind

docs.speaker: HOTSPUR
docs.text_entry: Within her womb; which, for enlargement striving,

docs.speaker: HOTSPUR
docs.text_entry: Shakes the old beldam earth and topples down

docs.speaker: HOTSPUR
docs.text_entry: Steeples and moss-grown towers. At your birth

docs.speaker: HOTSPUR
docs.text_entry: Our grandam earth, having this distemperature,

docs.speaker: HOTSPUR
docs.text_entry: In passion shook.

docs.speaker: GLENDOWER
docs.text_entry: Cousin, of many men

docs.speaker: GLENDOWER
docs.text_entry: I do not bear these crossings. Give me leave

docs.speaker: GLENDOWER
docs.text_entry: To tell you once again that at my birth

docs.speaker: GLENDOWER
docs.text_entry: The front of heaven was full of fiery shapes,

docs.speaker: GLENDOWER
docs.text_entry: The goats ran from the mountains, and the herds

docs.speaker: GLENDOWER
docs.text_entry: Were strangely clamorous to the frighted fields.

docs.speaker: GLENDOWER
docs.text_entry: These signs have markd me extraordinary;

docs.speaker: GLENDOWER
docs.text_entry: And all the courses of my life do show

docs.speaker: GLENDOWER
docs.text_entry: I am not in the roll of common men.

docs.speaker: GLENDOWER
docs.text_entry: Where is he living, clippd in with the sea

docs.speaker: GLENDOWER
docs.text_entry: That chides the banks of England, Scotland, Wales,

docs.speaker: GLENDOWER
docs.text_entry: Which calls me pupil, or hath read to me?

docs.speaker: GLENDOWER
docs.text_entry: And bring him out that is but womans son

docs.speaker: GLENDOWER
docs.text_entry: Can trace me in the tedious ways of art

docs.speaker: GLENDOWER
docs.text_entry: And hold me pace in deep experiments.

docs.speaker: HOTSPUR
docs.text_entry: I think theres no man speaks better Welsh.

docs.speaker: HOTSPUR
docs.text_entry: Ill to dinner.

docs.speaker: MORTIMER
docs.text_entry: Peace, cousin Percy; you will make him mad.

docs.speaker: GLENDOWER
docs.text_entry: I can call spirits from the vasty deep.

docs.speaker: HOTSPUR
docs.text_entry: Why, so can I, or so can any man;

docs.speaker: HOTSPUR
docs.text_entry: But will they come when you do call for them?

docs.speaker: GLENDOWER
docs.text_entry: Why, I can teach you, cousin, to command

docs.speaker: GLENDOWER
docs.text_entry: The devil.

docs.speaker: HOTSPUR
docs.text_entry: And I can teach thee, coz, to shame the devil

docs.speaker: HOTSPUR
docs.text_entry: By telling truth: tell truth and shame the devil.

docs.speaker: HOTSPUR
docs.text_entry: If thou have power to raise him, bring him hither,

docs.speaker: HOTSPUR
docs.text_entry: And Ill be sworn I have power to shame him hence.

docs.speaker: HOTSPUR
docs.text_entry: O, while you live, tell truth and shame the devil!

docs.speaker: MORTIMER
docs.text_entry: Come, come, no more of this unprofitable chat.
